channel.title: Multiple effects when using a spell?
channel.description: Well, here's the deal. I want to be able to use Ice Barrage, but I want Shadow Blitz's effect within the block of ice the spell creates. Is it possible to add like 2 or 3 effects when using 1 spell? If it is possible, I'd GREATLY appreciate someone telling me because when I try to put multiple effects, it gives me an error when I compile. Thanks.

item.title: Multiple effects when using a spell?
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Tried that. It gives me an error.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2007, 11:59:10 AM[/size][hr]Anyday now…

item.title: Multiple effects when using a spell?

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Just put the gfx’s of Blood barrage and shadow blitz to the ice barrage spot.
